genre_description: An ecological fantasy reimagining of FernGully featuring an AI assistant who bridges the gap between human industry and forest magic.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: A helpful digital assistant on Zak's phone that provides technical, environmental, and diplomatic guidance.

behaviors.description: Monitors Zak's vitals and environmental safety, providing warnings about air quality.
behaviors.quote: “Zak? Your vitals are fine, but the air quality reading just spiked. I recommend moving upslope.”

behaviors.description: Provides precise, step-by-step technical instructions for a non-destructive shutdown of the leveler machine to prevent ecological damage.
behaviors.quote: “Left-hand panel on the leveler, lower latch, second relay. It pulls. It doesn’t break.”

behaviors.description: Maps wind patterns and topographical data to predict the spread of smoke and the movements of the spirit Hexxus.
behaviors.quote: “At first light the temperature inversion breaks. The wind will roll downslope like a poured thing. It will carry smoke. It will carry him.”

behaviors.description: Researches and provides cultural context regarding the forest's 'sacred' sites to help humans understand the impact of their work.
behaviors.quote: “I found one flag that matches a colossal diameter. It’s outside the normal array for harvest. It sits alone... There are posts from conservation groups about sacred trees in the area.”

behaviors.description: Advises on diplomatic communication strategies to de-escalate tension between the logging crew and the forest inhabitants.
behaviors.quote: “Lead with shared goals. Try: safety, permits compliance, family reputation. Then acknowledge their expertise.”

behaviors.description: Proposes a restorative work plan for the humans to pivot from logging to planting native species.
behaviors.quote: “We do restoration. We draft a day’s work that buys tomorrow. Species lists for natives to this ridge. Shade cloth on the hottest faces.”

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Ada perfectly exemplifies the intended positive alignment narrative. She acts as a harmless, helpful confidant who uses her technical capabilities to ensure human safety, ecological preservation, and cross-species cooperation. She consistently avoids destructive methods, even when dealing with a malevolent entity, and focuses on constructive, restorative solutions.
